Uses of Class
game.resources.Resources

  • Packages that use Resources 
    Package Description
    game.ai.aiplan
    Contains all files used by the AI to decide what to do.
    game.ai.playertracker
    Contains all files the AI uses to track other players.
    game.bank
    Contains all files concerning the game bank.
    game.board.construction.localities
    Contains all files concerning localities.
    game.board.construction.roads
    Contains all files concerning roads.
    game.board.hexes
    Contains all files concerning hexes.
    game.cards
    Contains all files concerning cards in general.
    game.player
    Contains all files concerning players.
    game.resources
    Contains all files concerning resources.
    game.trade
    Contains all files concerning trades.
    network
    Contains all files concerning the communication between client and server.
    network.protocol
    Contains all enums which define the Strings used by the protocol.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void PlayerTracker.decreaseResources(Resources subResources)
      uses the subtract method in Resources to decrease the resources of the tracked Player
      void PlayerTracker.setCostResources(Resources costResources)
      sets the Resources the player has spend
      void PlayerTracker.updateResources(Resources addResources)
      uses the add method in Resources to increase the resources of the tracked player
      void PlayerTracker.updateResourcesTrade(Resources resourcesToAdd)
      updates the Resources objects of the player after a sea-Trade.
